affects:

DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:

SLOW: 20%

SLOW DURATION: 2
cmb:

COOLDOWN: 8
desc: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.
lore: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.
name: skeleton_king_hellfire_blast

desc: Nearby friendly units gain hit points based on their damage dealt when attacking enemy units.
notes: Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
lore: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.
name: skeleton_king_vampiric_aura

desc: Wraith King passively gains a chance to deal bonus damage on an attack.
lore: One blow to crush a foe.
name: skeleton_king_mortal_strike

cmb:
MANA COST: 160
COOLDOWN: 260/160/60
desc: Wraith King's members regroup after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in the area will be slowed by 75%.
notes:
Wraith King won't revive if he doesn't have enough mana.
If Wraith King has an Aegis and Reincarnation off cooldown, Reincarnation will trigger first.
Revives with full HP and Mana.
lore: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.
name: skeleton_king_reincarnation
